## CommandRegistry.getCommandUsageString() method

Returns the given command's usage string.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getCommandUsageString(command: Command, prefix: string, translator: Translator): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  command | [Command](./noisecord.command.md) | Command to give the usage string to. |
|  prefix | string | Prefix to place in front of command string. |
|  translator | [Translator](./noisecord.translator.md) | Translator to use for localization. |

**Returns:**

string

Usage string.
